text: evayehi ovun (ætulu vu vahama) “apage allah deviyan vahansa! oba itamat parisuddhavantayeki. (oba itamat parisuddhavantayeki)” yayi pavasannaha. ehi (tamange mituranva hamu vana sæmavitama) “salamun (aleyikum)” yayi subha pætum karannaha. avasanayedi “prasamsa siyalla sakala lokayan siyalla utpadanaya kara, posanaya kara, samvardhanaya kara, paripalanayakaranna vu allahtama ayitiya” yayi (prasamsa kara) suvisuddha karamin sitinnaha
